org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc

Interface AndroidNfcReader


  • public AndroidNfcReader

    SeReader to communicate with NFC Tag though Android NfcAdapter

    Configure NFCAdapter Protocols with AndroidNfcReaderImpl.setParameter

    Optimized for android 4.4 (API 19) to 6.0 (API 23)

    See Also:
    NfcAdapter

    • Field Detail

      • Companion

        static org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcReader.Companion Companion

    • Method Detail

      • printTagId

        @NotNull
java.lang.String printTagId()

        Gets a string describing the low level description of the current tag.

        Used for logging purpose

        Returns:
        string

      • processIntent

        void processIntent(@NotNull
                   android.content.Intent intent)

        Process data from NFC Intent. Can be use to handle NFC Tag received when app is triggered by nfc detection

        Parameters:
        intent - : Intent received and filterByProtocol by xml tech_list

      • enableNFCReaderMode

        void enableNFCReaderMode(@NotNull
                         android.app.Activity activity)

        Declare app to handle NFC Tags while in the foreground

      • disableNFCReaderMode

        void disableNFCReaderMode(@NotNull
                          android.app.Activity activity)

        Stop app handling NFC Tags while in the foreground
